tasks.name: Onboarding pipeline built
tasks.details: 1,810-line single-page flow: username ‚Üí quiz (11+5 questions) ‚Üí Claude generates SOUL.md/USER.md/IDENTITY.md ‚Üí OAuth ‚Üí redirect. Includes onboarding-server.js (635 lines) + profile-generator.js (300 lines).

tasks.name: Onboarding server API
tasks.details: Port 3848: 8 endpoints for onboarding, quiz, profile generation, auth, readiness checks.

tasks.name: Wildcard SSL + nginx routing
tasks.details: *.clawdaddy.sh wildcard SSL cert (Let's Encrypt DNS challenge via Route 53). Nginx reverse proxy routes subdomains to customer IPs via map file. update-routing.sh helper for add/remove/list.

tasks.name: Security groups

tasks.name: Wildcard DNS (*.clawdaddy.sh)

tasks.name: Nginx subdomain routing
tasks.details: Nginx map-based routing: subdomain ‚Üí customer IP. Config at /etc/nginx/clawdaddy/customers.map. Helper script: update-routing.sh add|remove|list.
